name: Kogi BBQ
description: The legendary truck that started the Korean-Mexican fusion craze.

events.title: Korean BBQ Cooking Class
events.description: Learn to make authentic Korean BBQ tacos from our head chef! Includes all ingredients and take-home recipes.

events.title: Live Music Night with Local Bands
events.description: Enjoy great food and live music from three amazing local bands. Full menu available!

name: Mariscos Jalisco
description: Serving LA's most celebrated shrimp tacos for over a decade.

events.title: Taco Tuesday Trivia Night
events.description: Test your knowledge while enjoying our famous shrimp tacos! Prizes for winning teams.

events.title: Seafood Prep Workshop
events.description: Learn the secrets of preparing fresh seafood like a pro. Hands-on experience included!

name: Leo's Tacos Truck
description: Famous for their irresistible al pastor tacos carved right off the spit.

events.title: Al Pastor Carving Demo
events.description: Watch our taquero demonstrate the art of al pastor carving. Free samples for attendees!

events.title: Salsa Making Workshop
events.description: Create three different authentic Mexican salsas from scratch. Take home your creations!

name: Guerrilla Tacos
description: Gourmet, artisanal tacos that push the boundaries of flavor.

events.title: Wine & Taco Pairing Experience
events.description: Elevated dining experience pairing our signature tacos with carefully selected wines.

name: Free Range
description: The original tempura-fried chicken sandwich that's crispy, juicy, and perfect.

events.title: Family Game Night
events.description: Bring the whole family for board games, activities, and our famous chicken sandwiches!

events.title: Fried Chicken Masterclass
events.description: Master the art of perfect fried chicken with our signature tempura technique.

name: The Halal Guys
description: The original NYC street cart serving world-famous gyros and chicken over rice.

events.title: Middle Eastern Culture Night
events.description: Experience Middle Eastern culture through food, music, and stories. Special menu available!

name: NY Dosas
description: Legendary vegan South Indian street food from an award-winning cart.

events.title: Vegan Cooking Workshop
events.description: Learn to create delicious vegan Indian street food. All plant-based, all delicious!

events.title: Saturday Morning Yoga & Dosas
events.description: Start your day with yoga followed by fresh, healthy dosas. Mats provided!

name: King of Falafel & Shawarma
description: Award-winning, must-try falafel and shawarma straight from the streets of Astoria.

events.title: Falafel Making Class
events.description: Learn the secret to perfect, crispy falafel from our award-winning chef!

name: Korilla BBQ
description: Bold and flavorful Korean BBQ served up in burritos, bowls, and salads.

events.title: K-Pop Dance Party
events.description: Dance to the hottest K-Pop hits while enjoying Korean BBQ fusion food!

events.title: Korean Language & Cooking
events.description: Learn basic Korean phrases while preparing traditional dishes. Perfect for beginners!
